feed.title: A design for Probabilistic Partial Pruning

entry.title: A design for Probabilistic Partial Pruning
entry.summary: In an email sent on February 27th, 2021 at 22:09 by Yuval Kogman, the topic of discussion included work related to fountain codes. Though there was some confusion in the email where the first half of a sentence needed to be deleted as it had already been incorporated into the following sentence.
